attributes.action: Allow all pay and allowances paid to MPs to be viewed by the public under the freedom of information act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs are the representatives of the people and paided for by the people via taxes. They should not be exempt from the freedom of imformation act when it comes to pay and allowances. Members of parliment must remember that they are placed in thier position by the public and therefor have a duty to that public/voters. The public/voters do not have a duty to them. We the public/voters have a hard time making ends meet, so we need to make sure that we are getting our monies worth. MPs are in a position of aurthority, please do not abuse it. Restricting access will be an abuse of this power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
